scenes.text:
We are Cardiff University Ladies RFC, we are a dynamic community with an environment which allows all our members to grow and develop as players!

We train and socialise frequently, creating a space to not just improve as a player but also to make friends and lifelong memories!

We meet regularly every week to train and socials, with socials every Wednesday!

Our training schedule is available on our SU page!

We have 4 different types of membership at varying prices:

First Team Membership: £85.00
Second Team Membership: £85.00
Third Team Membership: £40.00
Social Membership: £20.00

We are one of the most social clubs in the AU and have a range of themes for our events. Our events are often held at the Taf in the SU, as well as many sober events such as movie and pizza nights, lazerquest and more!
